Module com.example.mycasinofx
Package com.example.mycasinofx.Model.games.TwentyOne

Class TwentyOne

java.lang.Object
com.example.mycasinofx.Model.games.Games
com.example.mycasinofx.Model.games.TwentyOne.TwentyOne
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameInterface
public class TwentyOne extends Games implements GameInterface
Represents a Twenty-One (Blackjack) game. Extends the Games class and implements the GameInterface.

    • TwentyOne

      public TwentyOne()
      Constructor for the TwentyOne class. Initializes the Cards instance, player's and bot's card lists, and resultGenericClass.

  • Method Details

    • play_game

      public void play_game()
      Starts a new game of Twenty-One. Resets the game state, shuffles the card deck, and deals cards to the player and bot.

    • getCardToHand

      public void getCardToHand(boolean player)
      Deals a card to either the player or the bot.
      Parameters:
      player - True if dealing to the player, False if dealing to the bot.

    • tryGetBotCard

      public boolean tryGetBotCard()
      Attempts to deal a card to the bot. Determines whether the bot should draw a card based on its current total value.
      Returns:
      True if the bot drew a card, False otherwise.

    • getPlayerCards

      public ArrayList<String[]> getPlayerCards()
      Retrieves the player's cards.
      Returns:
      The ArrayList containing the player's cards.

    • getBotCards

      public ArrayList<String[]> getBotCards()
      Retrieves the bot's cards.
      Returns:
      The ArrayList containing the bot's cards.

    • getBotValue

      public int getBotValue()
      Retrieves the total value of the bot's cards.
      Returns:
      The total value of the bot's cards.

    • getPlayerValue

      public int getPlayerValue()
      Retrieves the total value of the player's cards.
      Returns:
      The total value of the player's cards.

    • checkWinner

      public void checkWinner()
      Checks the winner of the game based on the total values of the player's and bot's cards. Updates player's balance and profit accordingly.
      Specified by:
      checkWinner in interface GameInterface

    • generateResult

      public void generateResult()
      Generates the result of the game. This method is overridden from the GameInterface.
      Specified by:
      generateResult in interface GameInterface

    • reset

      public void reset()
      Resets the game state by clearing the player's and bot's card lists, and resetting their values.
